summary: A hot-headed inspector takes on a small but powerful Vietnamese-Chinese gang, after a series of crimes and murder attempts committed and putting an undercover cop and his girlfriend in great danger.
cast: Donnie Yen|Louis Koo|Collin Chou|Ray Lui|Bingbing Fan|Kent Cheng|Xing Yu|Ben Lam|Lan Law|Timmy Hung|Tony Ho|Ping Ha|Irene Wang|Austin Wai|Wai Ai|Chi Wai Wong|Aaron Leung|Kenji Tanigaki|Kang Yu|Robert Zen Humpage|Damian Green|Damon Howe|Min Yoo|Drafus Chow|Dus Luu|Loi-Kwan Kam|Wong Yin Keung|Man Fan 'Fanny' Lee|Sherwin Ming|Yûji Shimomura|Hung Siu|Kin-Yung Tsang|Kimmi Man-Ching Tsui|Kea Wong|Qing Xu
director: Director: Wilson Yip (as Yip Wai Shun)
title: Dou foh sin
